content.rendered:
Where’s My Water? – A Fun and Challenging Puzzle Game

Where’s My Water? is a puzzle game that was developed by Creature Feep and published by Disney Mobile in 2011. The game has won several awards, including the Apple Design Award and the BAFTA Award for Best Handheld/Mobile Game. The game is available for devices using iOS, Android, Windows Phone and BlackBerry 10 operating systems, as well as desktop web browsers.

The game’s main character is Swampy, an alligator who lives in the sewers under the city. Swampy is different from the other alligators – he is curious, friendly and loves taking a shower. However, he faces trouble with the pipes and needs the player’s help to get water to his shower.

The game consists of four stories, each featuring a different character and theme. The stories are:

  • Swampy’s Story: The original story where the player has to guide fresh water to Swampy’s shower. The water can interact with various elements, such as dirt, algae, toxic water, steam and ooze. The player has to avoid obstacles and traps set by Cranky, Swampy’s nemesis.
  • Allie’s Story: A musical story where the player has to guide steam to Allie’s steam-powered instrument. Allie is the sewer’s most creative alligator and Swampy’s girlfriend. She plays classic Disney tunes on her instrument and the player can sing along with her.
  • Cranky’s Story: A food-themed story where the player has to use dirty purple water to clear the algae on Cranky’s plate. Cranky is a real gator’s gator who has a big appetite and will eat anything, except his greens. He dislikes Swampy and Allie for being different and tries to sabotage their plans.
  • Mystery Duck’s Story: A special story where the player has to catch a fancy teleporting Mystery Duck. The Mystery Duck can appear in any level and has different abilities, such as changing size, shape and color. The player has to time their moves carefully to catch the duck.

Each story has over 100 levels, each with a unique puzzle and challenge. The player can collect special items, such as rubber ducks and swampy items, that are hidden in each level. The player can also unlock bonus levels by completing certain tasks, such as tri-ducking (collecting all three ducks) or finding hidden objects.

The game has a simple but engaging gameplay that appeals to players of all ages and skill levels. The game also has amazing graphics, animations and sound effects that create a realistic and immersive experience. The game also features original characters and stories that are humorous and charming.

Where’s My Water? is a game that combines physics, logic and creativity to create a fun and challenging puzzle game. The game has received positive reviews from critics and players alike, who praised its originality, variety and quality. The game has also spawned several spin-offs, such as Where’s My Perry?, Where’s My Mickey? and Where’s My Water? 2.

If you are looking for a game that will test your brain and entertain you at the same time, you should try Where’s My Water?
